executable.title: Weighted Enhancement Image Filter
executable.description: This is a CLI supporting module and it is supposed to not be used directly with a simple input image.
executable.contributor: Antonio Carlos Senra Filho (University of Sao Paulo), Luiz Otavio Murta Junior (University of Sao Paulo)
executable.acknowledgements: This work was partially funded by CNPq grant 201871/2015-7/SWE and CAPES

image.name: contrastMap
image.label: Contrast Weighting Map
image.description: Contrast map to inform the spatial contrast weighting along the image space. The output from LSSegmenter could be applied here.

image.name: regionMask
image.label: Region Mask
image.description: Region mask where the contrast should be related to.

integer.name: weight
integer.label: Weighting Contrast
integer.description: The percentual weighting contrast to be applied over the image. The contrast map is the baseline spatial weighting distribution to increase the voxel contrast.

double.name: lesionThr
double.label: Lesion Threshold
double.description: Threshold to set of is the lesion intensity level present in the contrast map.
